item.title: Top House Democrat says Hunter Biden pardon was 'disappointing,' calls out Biden for flip-flop
item.description: Rep. Pete Aguilar says President Biden went back on his word when he pardoned his son, Hunter Biden.

item.title: House GOP leaders endorse Trump-backed candidate Jimmy Patronis for Matt Gaetz's old seat
